QuestData.Title: Lady Lunastre
QuestData.Description:
Our friend Ly'leth contacted me. She requested that you meet her atop the Grand Promenade as it overlooks the city.
Have your disguise ready just in case, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Ly'leth at the Grand Promenade.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope you have prepared yourself to enter the City. It is time.
